item.title: On studying and the role of educational institutions
item.description: This post will talk about my thoughts concerning knowledge, the act of studying, and the role of educational institutions in this topic. What caused the rambling Since the third year of High School, I started thinking about the relationship between studying, schools, and professors. Are schools and universities necessary to gain knowledge, or is studying also an individual act? What about professors? What’s their role? Is their job only to teach their assigned subject or do they serve a broader and more noble purpose?
